tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE therapist_schedule (
  therapist_id INT NOT NULL,
  client_id INT NOT NULL,
  appointment_date DATE NOT NULL,
  appointment_time TIME NOT NULL,
  duration_minutes INT NOT NULL,
  appointment_notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE appointments (
 appointment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 therapist_id INT NOT NULL,
 client_id INT NOT NULL,
 appointment_date DATE NOT NULL,
 appointment_time TIME NOT NULL,
 appointment_duration INT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE therapists (
  therapist_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  therapist_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  therapist_specialty VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE clients (
  client_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  client_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  client_email VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE appointments (
  appointment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  therapist_id INT NOT NULL,
  client_id INT NOT NULL,
  appointment_date DATE NOT NULL,
  appointment_time TIME NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE therapist_schedule (
  therapist_id INT,
  day_of_week VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
  start_time TIME NOT NULL,
  end_time TIME NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (therapist_id, day_of_week)
)

CREATE TABLE appointments (
  appointment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  therapist_id INT,
  client_id INT,
  appointment_date DATE NOT NULL,
  start_time TIME NOT NULL,
  end_time TIME NOT NULL,
  appointment_notes TEXT
);
